nodes.documentation:
@dev Implements simple fixed point math mul and div operations.
 @author Alberto Cuesta Cañada
nodes.name: DecimalMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies x and y, assuming they are both fixed point with 27 digits.
nodes.name: muld

nodes.documentation: @dev Divides x between y, assuming they are both fixed point with 18 digits.
nodes.name: divd

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides x between y, rounding up to the closest representable number.
 Assumes x and y are both fixed point with `decimals` digits.
nodes.name: divdrup
